body: I got side-tracked, but I accidentally found this via Discord (Mudae). lol

@Hentai4Lif3, why? many good isekai start with MC dying and reverting into shota (some transfer as teens, and some shift into other stuff). But most isekai hentai have shota MC (again, not all). 

Personally, I'ld want to isekai as shota with op abilities, because of personal reasons.
If I can reincarnate into that world as a shota I'd KMS right away
@Iexpectedbetter ah, so more hentai logic. Good shit :3
This shit is my jam, but what was the purpose of the first couple pages? Actual pedo stuff >.>
